title: Anivia Montage(ex dia player), Looking for reviews/constructive criticism to help improve editing!

embed.description: HEY GUYS its been in the working for a while, i know its only short but this way i can stay motivated to make more videos faster! So i hope you guys enjoy my season 6 Anivia mid lane montage! Share this video!: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VUY-v... Keep up with us!

body:
Hey guys
Iv been playing Anivia for a long time now, I have mained anivia since Season 4 were I climbed to Diamond 5 with her! but during season 5 i took a rather long break and fell down but now im back! so i thought its finally time to put together a little montage, its shorter than my other videos but this allows me to try make more videos and punch them out sooner! please leave any constructive criticism so i can continue to improve! and let me know what you think! :D

(Im getting better with my edits but i still have a ways to go yet!)


THANKS
DUCKYY  {{champion:34}} {{summoner:31}}

replies.body: That's really good montage i watch quite a few and they are mainly too packed with either heaps of music and loud or over editing that makes you go wtf is going on. This is like a lot simple but well edited :) keep it up. Love anivia too such a great champion
